i18n.collectors.ovh.instructions:
Get you credentials by clicking on this link.
  • Enter the name and the description of your choice
  • Select an unilimited validity
  • The rights must be "GET /me/bill"
  • Click on the button "Create"
  • Copy the Application key, Application secret and Consumer key in the form bellow
